content: I got another "award" Friday as a Health IT Influencer, whatever that means. It certainly brings no income with it.:-) But if there is any outbound messaging where it might be useful to our cause to leverage it, just holler ...
well, we believe in data exchange standards as a way to solve healthcare problems - so anything you say to help that, or to invite people to join us..
I'd qualify that with "help solve". There are some parts of the healthcare space that standards can't fix :(

Interesting... I see that the HL7 Twitter account retweeted my June post about "HL7 makes it official: fhir exists to help patients get their data" and it's getting a fair amount of attention. Maybe it's time for a regular drip drip drip of that message.
